dic_local_help.adv: Rolls dice and chooses the highest. The syntax is **!adv nds+c**, where n=number of dice, s=amplitude of dice, c=list of modifiers. Can make multiple rolls separating dice with a blank space.
dic_local_help.cento: Rolls a single d100; no input required.
dic_local_help.coin: Tosses a coin; no input required. It has a 1/256 chance to give a tie.
dic_local_help.dis: Rolls dice and chooses the lowest. The syntax is **!dis nds+c**, where n=number of dice, s=amplitude of dice, c=list of modifiers. Can make multiple rolls separating dice with a blank space.
dic_local_help.elvenchad: Rolls 2d20 (with also modifiers), rerolls the least and chooses the highest. The syntax is **!elvenchad k**, where k=list of modifiers.
dic_local_help.forall: Rolls some dice and add modifiers to each result. The syntax is the same as !tira.
dic_local_help.help: You are very mad if you've asked me this... why?
dic_local_help.lc: Rolls input dice and explode the result; it can sum modifiers. The syntax is **!lc dk+mods**, where k=dice and mods is a list of modifiers.
dic_local_help.member: Sends as DM the number of member of this server; it doesn't count bots. Works only for admins.
dic_local_help.pg: Creates a lv 1 random character, selecting the race, the class, the sizes and generating its statblock.
dic_local_help.race: Generates race height and weight according to d&d 5e table. The syntax is **!race name**, where name is the race you have (in italian or english)
dic_local_help.redo: Repeat any command. You can activate it by replying to it and writing !redo.
dic_local_help.stats: Rolls 4 dice and sums the three highest. The syntax is **!stats x**, where x=many stats to generate (max 6).
dic_local_help.superstats: Generates three times six stats to grant the user to pick one combination among 3
dic_local_help.tira:
Rolls multiple dice (with also modifiers). The syntax is **!tira nds+c**, where n=number of dice, s=type of dice (among 2 and 256) and c=modifiers.
If the user puts a +/- beetween dice it will sum the results, if it's a blank space it will return separated results. Isolated numbers will be ignored.
dic_local_help.tpc: Rolls 1d20 and sums modifiers. The syntax is **!tpc x**, where x=modifiers (you must specify the sign).
dic_local_help.ts: Make a saving throw. The syntax is **!ts x <y**, where x=modifiers as in !tpc and y=dc of the saving throw.
